abstract.shortdesc: The add-on for version 20.1 or later provides a basic graphical interface to interact with repositories, and reduces the amount of context switching between your editor and the command line or another client application.

ul.li: Push changes to a remote branch
Pull updates from a remote branch
View change history and compare files between revisions

conbody.p: When you install the add-on, the and views become available in Author Mode. For more information about Author Mode views, see the help topic.
